left.text: one day u Nadir,or i sould say Mad Tom,was walking down the street...

panels.narration: and all of a sudden an Italian Mafia assulted him and left him in the desert to die
and at night the mad tom wasn't dead yet,so he starded walking,but the he heard a howel,it was cyotes,they tore him limb from limb,rip is brains out,suck all his blood,and tore out his inteastines.
